comment: My only friend in clg jo mujjse itna jhagda krti hai🫠.Mujhe itna sehen krne k liye tysm. Shakal bekar h pr dil ki boht achhi h. Hardworking to boht h pr rone me time waste kr deti h. Jldi se IIM aaja, pdp bhi leni h fhir teri aur start-up bhi krna h apna. Khush rehna 1720 yaad aayegi teri boht🫠
name: Ayush Maheshwari

comment: Bhot choti aur masoom dikhti hai..lekin harkate aur baaton se aunty lgti hai....attention ki bhooki..gossips ki pyasi...jhooti tareef krdo iski bss khush ho jati hai...roti bohot hai...achhi lgti hai rote hue ....aur Haan yaad aayge Teri 🥲....khush reh chhoti behen.
name: Kunwar zeeshan

comment: Cute, nibbi, cheerful, emotional. First girl jise ILU bola tha, pdp me of course 🙃🌚. Chota packet bada dhamaka, daantna shuru kar de to jagah, insaan aur galtiya bhul jati hai. Thanks for E-Summit, design head. Never self doubt.. ATB for future. Will miss your gossiping vali bate. Haste rehna.
name: Garvit Gupta

comment: Dikhne me chhoti si hai baaki puri aunty hai dimaag se aur maarti bohot hai.Bada dimaag khayaa hai tune but sweet and chulbuli si hi hai tu isiliye maaf kiya.Baaki jo itni daant khaai hai teri uska hisaab karke rakhiyo baad me barabar karenge. Aur hamesha excitement se bhari rahiyo jaise rehti hai.
name: Yogesh Mohan Dantare

comment: My adorable Confidant, Painter of our beautiful memories, kab humne 505 mein "hi" bolne se apne sare concerns aur choti si choti baatein share karna shuru kar diya pata hi nhi chala, Our chulbuli coffee girl tumhari jitni bhi taaref karu kam hai, Love u❤& will miss u yaar😭, Wish u brightest future.
name: Aayushi Choubey

comment: ataparynt chi sarvat candid and atut maitrin tuch ahes g.mi khup grateful ahe.ekdum sakhhi bahini sarkha ahet apn.nehmi ashech rhu.Itki samjutdar & gondas mulgi ajun nhi.Tu khup strong ahes g,never forget this.keep making🎨lvkr IIM blr la ye,apn khup majja kru.Tuzi khup athvan yeil g.luv u darling ❤
name: Kirtika Zanzan

comment: Isha, my girl😎, the creative artist, fab dancer, baaton me op, and genuine friends me topmost. Yr vo saari masti quarantine se lekar aakhiri din tak, all those deep conversations, sharing all our feelings, it all was so reall and heart-felt. Always keep soaring, milte rehenge warna bht yaad aayegi❤
name: Khushi Verma

comment: Isha..naa Group ki badi mummy..yaa, pr iski sunta koi nii hai(mere alawa).vo mai tujhe maarta nhi hu meri love language hi maar peet hai. Vse to bhot acchi hai bas faltu roya mat kr(strong hai na tuu). Aur haan wingwoman banney ke liye thanks. Stay healthy aage jarurat padegii🤞.
name: Yashraj Solanki

comment: Shakal pr mt jaana jitni bholi dikhti h utni hai nhi. One of the purest souls I found here. Genuinely kind hearted and kbhi kisi ka bura na chahne wli and always there to lend a hand. I admire you and look upto you for becoming a better human. Thanks for being there for me. Tc and meet soon😊
name: PARTH DWIVEDI

comment: The creative creation of the creator. The true chhota packet bada dhamaka in culturals. Pro kathak dancer, artist, singer etc. thanks for being the most inspirational lamster😂 also kaash tu humari flatmate hoti yaar🥲🫂🫂🫂🫂 I'll remember those ibcc times with you🙌🏻🙌🏻
name: Riya

comment:
Meri pyari betii🫂
501 ki psuedo- 6th member. 
Gonna miss all the bakaiti, room pr apni baatein, woh saree dhundhne ki struggles😂tere haath ki cold coffee aur chocolate mousse.
Roya Mt kr betii🫂 apni batteesii dikhate rha kr humesha. 
Ache se sab achieve kr aur all the best for the future🙌🏻
name: Bhavya Singh Thakur

comment: Aur 501 ki unofficial member😂😂. Go to person for gossips and fashion advice. Aur pls thanks mereko fit aane waale kapde rkhne ke liye. Humesha aisi hi khush aur sassy rehna! Aur grade ki itni tension mt le yaar! Chill. Looking forward to more emo talks, recipes and gossips..
name: Sreyashi

comment: A sweet and cheerful soul.  Thank you for the rakhi and time to time hal chal puchne ke liye. Nyaka ke case study, classroom mai gane chalana, aur bas yuhi mess mai bate karna. I will cherish these memories. Never knew I wanted a little sister until I met you. Hamesha khush rhena
name: Kh. Humendro Singh

comment: Lame jokes? Isha yaad aagyi. 501 m constant visits deke hume current affairs/gossips se vachit rakhna😂Our covid talks, saree outing day, random gossips at your room, after fluxus meet in hub:-)those were the best moments. Aur m 505 se hmesha ready houngi. Milte rehna n marathi m baat krte rahenge😂
name: Anushka

comment:
Heyooo!!
To the sweetest and cutest senior ever!
Thanks a bunch for all your help. Hoping to keep getting your guidance forever. Keep shining and growing in every aspect! ✨✨I'll always remember our little chats and moments together. Thanks for the memories!
name: Sugandha Vani

comment:
Hey "NOTEPAD" how you doin'? Been so long. Can't believe we will soon graduate. We started by sharing assignments and then we talked about songs and whatnot. You are my very first friend here. It has been lovely knowing you. Thanks for all the memories🥹🥹.
Really gonna miss you so much 🫂🫂.
name: Ayush

comment: Cute talkative girl. She can be in conversation with anything. It feels so good to talk to her. The only normal girl in the campus😂.Stay connected 🤞
name: Akshat Nahata

comment: You're one of the first few ppl I've been talking to since the start of college, bro, thank you for being so cute and sweet. And I can never thank you enough for helping me with dance bcz that was such a bucket list thing for me. M*****J*** haters for life lol. Stay happy and ATB ✌️🥹🫶🫶
name: K Madhumitha

comment: Hey beautiful! Even though we spent less time together, every moment was filled with fun—whether it was working on Missfits, gossiping in 506, or that memorable weird photoshoot of mine. You're energetic and caring, and I appreciate all the help, including the eyeliner(hehe). Take care and ATB.
name: Manisha

comment: Bro, you have such a beautiful soul! You're always there to help, no matter what.  Your smile is contagious, and I love your adorable personality! Wishing you all the best for everything you dream of. Keep shining bright! ❤️✨
name: Monika

comment: Hi Isha...online m assignment copy krne se lekr lab project krne tk you've been a great teammate. Online meet ki gossips ya campus m BT we've been same. Sayad or jyada time de skte the but Jo v hua h accha rha abtak..& hoping ki aage v rhega. Stay happy and chhoti 😇 (jk). Best wishes for ur future.
name: Himanshu Gupta

comment: Bhut innocent shakal haiii. Dimag ki thodi Kami haii pr thik haii... Rona thoda km krde or haan Ab mujhe pareshan Mt Krna kisi bhii chiz ke liye 🙃. Khush rehna hamesha.
name: Harsh Jain

comment: Possibly the best duo for sing along and karaoke. Kindness and understanding defines her. Innocent lady with huge ambitions and humble attitude, also a witty side like an elegant matriarch. Wishing all the success in the world to the most compassionate one, spreading positivity and hope. Isha
name: Nilay Ganvit

comment: The most beautiful smile on campus!1A day becomes lively at your Hi on the DA-APJ road. Thanks for inter-IIT tech meet.  Thanks for always being a positive presence around everyone. I wish you all the best for your upcoming goals!!! All the best keep in touch!
name: Abhijit Panda

comment: Here's to the bacchi of our group 🥂. You've got a sweet voice, we should have recorded songs on guitar, but anyway. Just chill, roya kam kar, and all the best for the future ✨.
name: Varun Kumar

comment: 1st and the cutest girl I met in cllg, yet with a solid courage & dedication towards her work. Influenced by ur humbleness with others. Really felt sad about ur BTP result. Please do forgive me in case of any unintentional hurt. Great to have a frnd like u. Best wishes for future & be in touch.
name: Sanskar Gupta

comment: Best of luck for everything. Be happy and have fun.
name: Samrat Telse

comment: You were the first person to visit my room during quarantine...stay the way you are...ATB for all your future endeavors....bas roya thoda kam kar 🙂🙂 sab badiya hoga
name: Nitya
